entry.title: Introducing Huma 2.0: Real Yield on Solana
entry.content:
Today marks a pivotal moment for Huma and the DeFi ecosystem as we launch Huma 2.0, our permissionless, compliant, and composable yield platform built on Solana. With Huma 2.0, we're opening access to stable, double-digit yield generated by real payment financing activities. The opportunities previously reserved for institutions are now available to everyone—and it's about  time.

By making our product permissionless, we’ve now made real yield accessible to everyone, allowing anyone, anywhere to earn from the flow of real-life commerce.   


What Huma 2.0 Offers: Features Built for You


We've designed Huma 2.0 with flexibility and choice at its core, rolling out a set of features that let users choose how they want to earn. Here’s a breakdown of what’s inside:

Choose the path that suits your goals:  

  • Classic mode: Provides stable, double-digit real yield (currently 10.5% USDC APY, updated monthly) combined with baseline Huma Feathers. Think steady, predictable, sustainable. 

  • Maxi mode: Built for Huma maxis. Skip the USDC yield (0% APY) to maximize Huma Feathers, earning up to 25x the feathers during the limited-time launch promotion. Go big, go all-in. 

  • Flexibility: LPs can switch the mode of their existing positions anytime, at no extra charge beyond gas fees. 

  • Optional Lock-ups for more rewards: While not required, locking your deposit for 3 or 6 months significantly increases your Feather reward multipliers. The longer the commitment, the bigger the multiplier. During the lock-up period, users generally cannot withdraw their funds without forfeiting some accrued rewards, thus ensuring predictable liquidity management for Huma and stable returns for users.

  • $PST: Liquid & composable LP token: Depositing in Classic mode gets you the liquid LP token $PST (PayFi Strategy Token). It represents your share, is yield-bearing, and is built for DeFi composability, plugging right into the Solana ecosystem. Our Huma 2.0 launch integration partners are:
     

    • Jupiter: Swap $PST for USDC anytime, instantly.  

    • Kamino: Borrow USDC against your $PST. Loop, farm, and maximize yield (coming soon).  

    • RateX: Split PST to enter leveraged YT/PT strategies (coming soon). 

  • Referral system: Grow the community and get rewarded. Earn 10% of the Feathers collected by friends you invite for one entire year.  

Why This Launch Matters

Let’s be REAL. Finding stable, sustainable double-digit yield is a hard task. Historically, it's been reserved for top institutions and family offices, while most people settled for fractions of a percent. much of DeFi yield, despite unlocking access, has been driven by speculation, token emissions, and market cycles, often proving unsustainable, especially in bear markets. DeFi yield typically comes from token incentives or staking rewards tied to highly speculative activity, making them prone to volatility and heavy fluctuation depending on market cycles. The timing for Huma 2.0 couldn't be more critical. DeFi is ready for a new type of yield – one that is grounded in real life.

Against this backdrop, the tools for a better system are rapidly maturing. Stablecoins are experiencing insane growth, with transaction volumes recently climbing to a reported $35 trillion, highlighting their rapid adoption as efficient financial rails. Huma leverages these stablecoins and blockchain technology to power its PayFi network.  

This confluence – the market's need for sustainable yield and the rise of stablecoins – makes now the perfect time for Huma 2.0. By using stablecoins and on-chain liquidity, Huma's PayFi network accelerates global payments, generating stable, double-digit yield that originates from real financial activity.

Real Life, Real Yield: Stable Through Bull or Bear


We can’t stress it enough; this yield is built different! PayFi yield is earned from real financial activity – transaction fees paid by businesses using the network.

Here’s the engine: Each time a business taps into the PayFi network to settle a payment, it pays a daily fee (typically 6 to 10 basis points) to access liquidity until it is repaid. Because the liquidity is repaid frequently—often within one to five days—the same capital can be recycled many times per year. That rapid turnover creates a compounding effect that drives strong, recurring yields for liquidity providers.

The result is stable, double-digit yield that doesn’t depend on bull markets or token farming. This yield doesn't follow market cycles. Markets go up and down; PayFi yield doesn’t. Whether crypto is booming or dipping, people still spend, send, and settle – that's where the yield comes from. This makes Huma’s stable, double-digit yield incredibly attractive and reliable, especially in bear markets when other sources may dry up. It’s powered by real businesses moving real money. As long as global commerce continues (and we all know it will), the yield is sustainable.


Join the PayFi Movement

Huma 2.0 goes beyond a new platform; it's an invitation to participate in a more open, efficient, and accessible financial future, embodying our mission to accelerate the movement of money for a world that’s always on. It reflects the Huma ethos – a reminder to aim higher, break free from what holds us back, and embrace the endless possibilities that lie beyond.  

Every past revolution in finance has served the few. Remember those who weren’t invited to the last financial revolution – the one led by PayPal, Stripe, and other gatekeepers? This time, it's different. The barriers are gone, the system is changing, and the power is no longer centralized. PayFi is opening up access.  

With Huma 2.0, you can actually be part of the next financial revolution. By joining now, you gain early access to this unique yield source, accumulate Huma Feathers, and get in ahead of our upcoming Token Generation Event (TGE), as we prepare to be the first major project to launch on Jupiter's upcoming LFG 2.0 platform. Early support for real-life finance comes with real upside.  

Ready to earn Real Yield? Start earning now: https://app.huma.finance/

entry.title: Splyce & Huma Unveil SOLMATE to Keep Solana Yield Sustainable Amid SIMD-228 Staking Shifts
entry.content:
Pairing Staking Rewards and Real-World Yield for Smarter, More Resilient Returns.

Solana’s staking landscape is on the verge of a major shift. With SIMD-228 poised to slash SOL staking rewards, investors will need new strategies to maintain strong, sustainable yields. Splyce Finance and Huma Finance have partnered to launch SOLMATE, an innovative decentralized exchange-traded fund (dETF) that pairs liquid staking with real-world cash flows — helping investors navigate this new reality.

A More Efficient Approach to Solana Yield.

SOLMATE is a USDC-denominated Multi-Yield dETF designed to optimize capital efficiency and risk-adjusted returns. It seamlessly integrates:

JupSOL – Jupiter’s top-performing liquid staking token.

PayFi Strategy Token (PST) – Huma’s upcoming liquid LP token, targeting double-digit yield backed by fees derived from real-world payment flows.

This dual-yield structure provides diversification and stability, allowing investors to maintain upside exposure while reducing volatility in a post-SIMD-288 environment.

“We built the liquid PayFi Strategy Token to establish the transactional economy and sustainable real-world yield as a core DeFi primitive. Splyce’s diversified strategy empowers every SOLMATE to enhance SOL LSTs’ returns with fees collected from real-world payment flows. It’s truly groundbreaking,” said Erbil Karaman, Co-founder of Huma Finance.

“SOLMATE represents the next evolution of on-chain investing. By combining real-world cash flows with Solana’s DeFi ecosystem, it offers investors a more stable yield without sacrificing upside exposure. This approach ensures capital remains productive, liquid, and positioned for growth,” said Manuel Rensink, Co-founder of Splyce Finance.

Nick Ducoff, Head of Institutional Growth at Solana Foundation, noted the broader implications: “Structured investment strategies are a key step in the evolution of Solana’s financial ecosystem.”

SOLMATE is fully permissionless and set to integrate with Solana’s leading DeFi protocols in the upcoming months, providing deep liquidity, frictionless access to decentralized money markets, and a robust portfolio management framework for both retail and institutional investors.

About Splyce Finance. Splyce Finance is a permissionless Solana-native platform pioneering the launch of index- and yield dETFs. Designed for both asset managers and investors, Splyce delivers an on-chain platform for diversified yield generation. For more information, visit https://splyce.finance and follow Splyce on X for the latest updates.

About Huma Finance. Huma is the first PayFi network, powering financing of global payments with instant access to liquidity—anywhere, anytime. With $3B+ in transaction volume and zero defaults to date, Huma is set to bring trillions in payment volume on-chain, eliminating the efficiencies in cross-border payment financing while providing investors with sustainable yield backed by real-world activity.

entry.title: Patrick F. Campos Joins Huma Finance as Chief Business Officer
entry.content:
Huma Finance welcomes Patrick F. Campos as Chief Business Officer (CBO), where he will lead strategic growth, forge key industry partnerships, and advance the company’s expansion in real-world asset (RWA) financing.

Patrick has built a career at the intersection of finance, blockchain, and regulation, tackling challenges in liquidity, capital efficiency, and market infrastructure. As former Chief Strategy Officer at Securrency, he was instrumental in developing institutional-grade blockchain-based financial and regulatory technology, focusing on tokenization, compliance, and global capital markets. His work has centered on solving inefficiencies in financial systems and unlocking new opportunities in decentralized finance and payments.

With a background in corporate strategy, capital markets, and regulatory frameworks, Patrick has advised companies in Web3, DeFi, digital payments, and financial technology, helping to shape investment and growth strategies. He has also held senior roles at King & Spalding, Baker Botts, and Chadbourne & Parke LLP, where he structured complex financial transactions.

Patrick has been deeply involved in Huma’s vision, having previously served as a strategic advisor to both Huma and Arf. He has already contributed to shaping the company’s approach to liquidity, working capital solutions, and financial infrastructure. In his new role, he will focus on expanding Huma’s global presence, strengthening industry partnerships, and positioning Huma as a key player in payment financing innovation.

“I’m thrilled to join the dynamic Huma Finance team to help to create new decentralized paradigms for real-world asset finance” said Patrick Campos. “Next-generation financial products must meet the needs of a new global marketplace of crypto-savvy DeFi investors while leaving space for regulatory innovation through thoughtful structuring and proactive engagement. I’m looking forward to working closely with Erbil Karaman, Richard Liu, and the rest of the team to bring to life their vision of a vibrant PayFi ecosystem in which Huma Finance will be both trailblazer and protagonist."

Beyond finance, Patrick has a track record of building and leading high-performance teams, shaped by his experience as a United States Marine Corps officer, a founder of the Emirates American Football League and the Emirates Gridiron League, and a head coach of multiple American football teams.

His leadership will accelerate Huma’s efforts to redefine global liquidity, credit, and access to capital.
